task_summary: Perceive the red object, approach and grasp it, then hold it steadily for a short duration.

task_long_description.overview: A tabletop scene shows several items (red cylinder, green bottle, cups/cans, orange figurines) with a robotic arm above. The instruction is to hold the red object. The behavior first detects and localizes the red object, aligns the end-effector, opens the gripper, executes a standard top grasp, verifies the grasp, and maintains a firm hold for a fixed duration without relocating the object. Timeouts and tolerances are conservative to ensure reliability amidst visual noise.
preconditions: Robot and camera calibrated; workspace clear.
Red object visible on the table within reachable workspace.
stepwise_plan: Search and confirm visibility of the red object.
Approach and align to a top grasp pose with tight tolerance.
Open gripper to an adequate width.
Execute a standard top grasp and close automatically within Pick.
Verify object is in gripper and grasp is stable.
Hold the object for the requested duration.
success_criteria: Object detected and approached without collision.
Hold maintained continuously for the full duration without slippage.
failure_and_recovery: If detection fails, retry the DetectObject step (decorator handles this).
If grasp unstable, repeat Pick after reopening the gripper.
task_long_description.termination: Tree succeeds after HoldObject completes; it fails if any step times out or conditions are not met.

frame_3.now_evidence: End-effector aligned directly above the red cylinder; clear pre-grasp posture.
frame_3.predicts_next: Gripper opening and descent for grasp are expected next.

node_specs.description: Detect and localize the red object.
Approach and align for a top grasp with tight tolerance.
Confirm the red object is held.
Check that grasp forces/pose are stable.
Maintain the hold for a fixed duration.
Retries detection up to 3 times if needed.

assumptions: The 'red object' corresponds to the prominent red cylinder visible near table center.
Instruction requests holding in place; no relocation required.
Top grasp is feasible given object shape and clearance.

expected_success_criteria: Hold completes full duration without drops
